overview: A handyman, a high school principal, a network engineer... they're just a few of the men presiding over a landmark obscenity trail. The sexual tension mounts in the hall of justice, where underlying passions erupt as Jury Duty intensifies. Crafted by legendary director Joe Gage and headlined by TitanMen exclusives David Anthony and Scotch Inkom, it proves that a hung jury is the best verdict. And before it's over, everyone will be guilty as sin....
title: Jury Duty
